summary: DEAR NHTSA,  I AM A DRIVER ON CALIFORNIA ROADS AND I WOULD LIKE TO SEE THE HIGH INTENSITY DISCHARGE LIGHTS PEOPLE HAVE INSTALLED ON THEIR VEHICLES TO BE MADE ILLEGAL.  WHEN I AM DRIVING, THE BRIGHTNESS FROM THESE HEADLIGHTS HAVE  CAUSED ME TEMPORARY LOSS OF VISION  THAT I NEED FOR THE SAFE OPERATION OF DRIVING MY VEHICLE. I BELIEVE THAT THEY ARE VERY DANGEROUS.  *JB
